IT小技巧/dokuwiki.html.title: dokuwiki
IT小技巧/dokuwiki.html.body: dokuwiki 安装LAMP环境apt-get install apache2 -y systemctl enable --now apache2 安装dokuwikiwget https://download.dokuwiki.org/src/dokuwiki/dokuwiki-stable.tgz tar -zxvf dokuwiki*.tgz mv dokuwiki* /var/www/html/dokuwiki cp /var/www/html/dokuwiki/.htaccess{.dist,} 配置apachecd /etc/apache2/sites-available vim /etc/apache2/sites-available/dokuwiki.conf a2ensite dokuwiki systemctl reload apache2 powered by Gitbook该文件修订时间： 2022-09-20 22:52:22
